long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Transform any webpage with a simple, powerful editing tool that feels like Google Docs for web design!

Are you in growth, marketing, or UX?

Tired of waiting on designers for every little change? 

Say goodbye to bottlenecks and hello to Control X, the Chrome extension that lets you redesign any webpage in a few clicks (without needing to dip into Figma).

What’s In It for You?
✂️ Cut Down on Design Time: Make quick, impactful edits directly on your web page—no design degree required.
📅 Version Control: Keep track of your changes with saved versions, complete with timestamps.
🌈 Full Spectrum Editing: Adjust text, fonts, colors, images, and more with a few clicks.
🔧 Add Instantly: Drop in new text, buttons, overlays, and boxes, crafting that perfect mockup in minutes.
👀 Preview & Share: Visualize changes instantly and share mockups for fast feedback.
🛠️ Figma? Don't get stuck pushing pixels around a screen. Create simple, pixel-perfect designs with no design skills.

How It Works

🚀 Launch the extension and enter the edit mode right on your desired webpage.
🎨 Start tweaking! Click on any element to modify it—no sidebar menus, no complex controls.
💾 Save your view to preserve your edits and create multiple versions for different needs.
🔄 Switch between saved views to compare and decide which edits make the cut.

Who's It For?
Growth Hackers looking to A/B test swiftly
UX Designers crafting user-centric interfaces
Digital Marketers personalizing landing pages
Product Managers conveying ideas clearly
You, the visionary who thrives on speed and simplicity

🎯 Goal-Oriented Design Made Simple
We know you're not just making changes; you're optimizing for conversions, user experience, and that "wow" factor. Control X isn’t just a tool; it’s your design partner in the digital space.
